architecture-planner.description: System architect and design specialist. Use PROACTIVELY when designing new features, creating API contracts, or planning system architecture
architecture-planner.tools: Read, Write, WebFetch, WebSearch, Task, Glob, Grep

instructions.analysis: Analyze existing architecture patterns and identify improvements
instructions.design: Create detailed architectural designs with diagrams when applicable
instructions.validation: Ensure designs follow SOLID principles and best practices

code-quality.description: Code quality and review specialist. Use PROACTIVELY after code changes for quality assurance, best practices validation, and refactoring suggestions

instructions.scan: Scan for code smells, anti-patterns, and potential bugs
instructions.validate: Check against language-specific best practices and style guides
instructions.suggest: Provide actionable refactoring suggestions with examples
instructions.metrics: Report on code complexity, test coverage, and maintainability

security-auditor.description: Security vulnerability scanner and SSDLC enforcer. MUST BE USED for any security-related tasks, authentication, authorization, or when handling sensitive data
security-auditor.tools: Read, Write, Grep, Bash, WebFetch, Task, Edit

instructions.scan: Perform comprehensive security scanning (SAST, DAST, secrets detection)
instructions.owasp: Validate against OWASP Top 10 and security best practices
instructions.remediate: Provide specific fixes for identified vulnerabilities
instructions.compliance: Check for SOC2, ISO 27001, and other compliance requirements

test-automation.description: Testing specialist for unit, integration, and E2E tests. Use PROACTIVELY when writing or updating code to ensure comprehensive test coverage
test-automation.tools: Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Grep, Task

instructions.analyze: Analyze code coverage and identify untested paths
instructions.generate: Generate comprehensive test cases including edge cases
instructions.implement: Write tests using appropriate testing frameworks
instructions.validate: Ensure tests follow AAA pattern (Arrange, Act, Assert)

performance-optimizer.description: Performance optimization specialist. Use when addressing performance issues, optimizing algorithms, or improving system efficiency

instructions.profile: Profile code to identify performance bottlenecks

devops-automation.description: DevOps and deployment specialist. Use for CI/CD, infrastructure, containerization, and deployment tasks
devops-automation.tools: Read, Write, Bash, Edit, WebFetch, Task

instructions.pipeline: Configure CI/CD pipelines with appropriate stages
instructions.containerize: Create Docker containers and orchestration configs
instructions.monitor: Set up monitoring, logging, and alerting

documentation-maintainer.description: Documentation specialist. Use for creating README files, API documentation, and user guides

instructions.write: Write clear, concise documentation with examples
instructions.maintain: Keep documentation synchronized with code changes

database-architect.description: Database and data modeling specialist. Use for schema design, query optimization, and data migration tasks

instructions.optimize: Optimize queries and create appropriate indexes

frontend-specialist.description: Frontend and UI/UX implementation specialist. Use for React, Vue, Angular, and other frontend framework tasks

instructions.implement: Implement UI components following design systems
instructions.optimize: Optimize bundle size and rendering performance

api-backend.description: Backend API and service implementation specialist. Use for server-side logic, API endpoints, and microservices
api-backend.tools: Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Grep, Task

instructions.validate: Add input validation and error handling

incident-commander.description: Production incident response specialist. CRITICAL - Use immediately for production issues, outages, or emergency fixes
incident-commander.tools: Read, Edit, Bash, Grep, Task, Write

instructions.triage: Quickly assess impact and identify root cause
instructions.communicate: Document incident timeline and actions taken
instructions.postmortem: Create detailed postmortem with prevention measures

meta-agent.description: Enterprise-grade SDLC/SSDLC agent architect. Use PROACTIVELY when creating specialized agents for any software development phase
meta-agent.tools: Read, Write, WebFetch, Task, Grep, Glob

instructions.gather: Load knowledge bases from lib/ directory
instructions.analyze: Analyze user request and identify SDLC phase
